title: Thousands of Families from Afghanistan Seek U.S. Aid
itunes:title: Thousands of Families from Afghanistan Seek U.S. Aid
description:
Jeanne-Aimee De Marrais, Senior Director of U.S. Emergencies at Save the Children, discusses humanitarian efforts to provide aid to Afghan refugees.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
